descriptions:
['DescriptionRented @ 85k til Feb 2021
Brand new apartment in Dubai Creek Residence, South T1
Luxury at its finest!
Beautiful and clear view of creek/future marina yacht dock / Burj Khalifa and the swimming pool.
Dubai Creek Residences will establish its presence at the creek as part of the island development, which captures the essence of harbour and marina lifestyle with its architecture and place making. 
With its distinct architecture, the towers respond to the island masterplan on this magnificent site on the creek. Dubai Creek Residence’s distinct form draws its inspiration from the mystic charm of the creek. 
Encircled by yacht clubs, pools, a world-class marina, retail podium and a boulevard glowing with activity, Dubai Creek Residences will become your new marina lifestyle and urban habitat.
With the soaring iconic cityscape enhancing the view from your window, these apartments possess a superlative lifestyle like no other, elevating you up to 35 storeys in the air and into an unparalleled existence of luxury.']

descriptions: ['DescriptionThe Property:This modern four bedroom townhouse with maids room is located in Mira Oasis 3, Reem Community.Mira Oasis in Reem offers a choice of cluster homes of three to four bedrooms townhouses.With views over the community and nearby to excellent facilities, such as restaurants and supermarkets.Walking distance to pool and park.Spacious living and dinning area.All bedrooms are on first floor.Type G unit.Built up area is 2,551 sq.ftHuge terrace and balcony with community views.Covered car parking spaces available.Handover December 2019.Our Office RERA registration number is 21329.For further details call Imtisal on +971561815038 or email at imtisal@stonebridgere.aeThe Location:Situated near Al Qudra Road and Shekh Mohammad Bin Zayed Road making this a very good location.GEMS World School, Dubai Bristish School and Dubai International Academy are the most nearby schools.Mall of Emirates and Dubai Outlet Mall are the nearest shopping malls.Mediclinic Arabian Ranches and Saudi German Hospitals are the hospitals near the area.Reem is a free hold area.']

descriptions: ['DescriptionWaters Edge brings high-quality waterfront living in Abu Dhabi as the latest residential project built on Yas.\xa0Located in Abu Dhabi, Yas Island represents a prime location where leisure, entertainment, family residences and business are combined. The island is a perfect place to set a home, since it is only 25 minutes from Abu Dhabi, 45 minutes from Dubai and 7 minutes from Abu Dhabi International Airport. Public bus routes are available. Yas island is the house of the Yas Marina Circuit, iconic architectural structures, 5 stars hotels and one of the largest shopping mall in The Emirates.Call Sona Zakaryan on +971563888845 / +97124451533 / 800373 or visit www.districtuae.com for further details']
